title: How do I get rid of this? (on the client)
body: ITs annoying. Make it go away,

replies.body: Yeah, something seems seriously off if you're still seeing assets from the legacy client.  You should download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a clean reinstall to get back on a clean state.  You should be able to glad healthy files after!

Ok I will try it.  I don't remember having good experiences with it last time.  If I remember correctly it busted my client the first time. I will give it a go.
> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WqbjABm4,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-29T18:10:46.440+0000)
>
> Yeah, something seems seriously off if you're still seeing assets from the legacy client.  You should download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a clean reinstall to get back on a clean state.  You should be able to glad healthy files after!

Ok so I figured out that I was apparently using the wrong launcher.  Why that launcher is in my files idk.
Ok I will try it.  I don't remember having good experiences with it last time.  If I remember correctly it busted my client the first time. I will give it a go.
It seems like your client is struggling to update to the current version.  What happens when you hit launch?  Are there any error messages?

No it goes to the login screen, and runs fine.....though i had an issue where it didnt patch right and when the game got out of champ select it(to the loading screen) it dropped saying files were not installed right.
